entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 30 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. Becoming a few clouds after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
